evidence.text: 2 | 2024-10-07 | Joint MOTION for Provisional Approval and Entry of Consent Decree by United States. add_extracted.value: On 2024-10-07, the United States filed a Joint Motion for Provisional Approval and Entry of Consent Decree, seeking court approval of a consent decree with the City of Durham, supported by a Memorandum in Support and Exhibits.

evidence.text: 13 | 2025-01-10 | Consent MOTION to Exceed Word Limitation by UNITED STATES OF AMERICA. Response to Motion due by 1/31/2025 (Attachments: # 1 Text of Proposed Order)(GIVEN, EMILY) (Entered: 01/10/2025)

add_extracted.value: On 2025-01-10, the United States filed a Consent Motion to Exceed Word Limitation, requesting an increase in the word limit for briefing on the applicability of Ricci v. Destefano to 9,000 words.
